website_summaries.verdict: A set of 12 puppets that fit like gloves and allow you to move legs and arms for the animals.
pros: A variety of animal types and lots of puppets in one set
Made with a good quality material
cons: These are a good size for child hands, but at 8.5 inches they are not very large for adults

customer_reviews.title: the hand opening is tiny and very shallow
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how these can be called puppets - the hand opening is tiny and very shallow, especially since none of the heads are hollow. You essentially have to awkwardly get two fingers into the 'arms' while your other fingers are bunched up and in the way - all while the material doesn't come even come down low enough to reach your wrist. The is true with small hands. It would be impossible to even fit a larger hand at all. This is really unfortunate because the animals are cute and I was hoping they would be fun for telling stories with our child.
customer_reviews.author: hxsolo

customer_reviews.title: A little small, a little awkward
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just LOVES these! I think what you get for the money is worth it, but the animals have stumpy legs, and their heads are controlled by one’s middle finger which is a very unnatural position and feels awkward and uncomfortable. They are also pretty small, so seem better for a child’s hand than an adults.
customer_reviews.author: KOak

customer_reviews.title: great variety and value
customer_reviews.text: I love that these little puppets fit my beginner Sunday School class children's hands so nicely. I love that there are a dozen different animals in this set, enough for one unique puppet per child. They are simple, but I just needed affordable and cute for this occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer resolution.
customer_reviews.text: The puppets are fairly small and wouldn’t fit on an adult hand. I was disappointed and wrote a bad review. The seller contacted me explaining how much they hope to work with customers to have the best experience possible. Together, we worked out a resolution that was more than fair. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fanciful, Portable, Plentiful and Priced-well
customer_reviews.text: Fun for party favors, classroom/day care, inter generational play. Soft, imaginative and generic— not tied to popular media.
customer_reviews.author: LGH_UWS

customer_reviews.title: Great for child therapists
customer_reviews.text: I do school based group and individual therapy and the kids love the puppets.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and practical
customer_reviews.text: This set of puppets is perfect for a traveling SLP such as me. I work in several settings and try to keep my materials light and compact. These animal puppets fit the bill perfectly. They are also small enough for little hands and there are enough to go around when I'm working with a group. On top of it all - the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Puppets
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this assortment of puppets. She has spent hours entertaining our family. Recommend this for your little puppeteer!
customer_reviews.author: R. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but my little one enjoyed them!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Crawford

customer_reviews.title: They're great puppets. Certainly worth the price
customer_reviews.text: They're great puppets. Certainly worth the price. My only issue is they are a little small for my hands, but I'm a big guy with large hands so that's too be expected. My kids love them though, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: B Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great for My Purposes - Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great size for kids yoga activities, and simple, but clear designs appreciated. They depict the animals they represent well.
customer_reviews.author: greenwomanyc

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching and playing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew and he loves them. Great for teaching and playing. Wide variety of animals provided and material is quality. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Amos

customer_reviews.title: Adorable hand puppets
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a four-star as they were very thin but extremely cute for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: I do daycare and bought these for my daycare kids for part of their Christmas present. The puppets were all really cute and in great condition. I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita larson

customer_reviews.title: this crew of mammals is well made and will definitely satisfy anyone with Trump sized or smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: These are some dope puppets, yo. As an adult, they fit snuggly, but to a rugrat they be poppin. Bag came with a veritable menagerie of little dudes. The monkey is goofy AF, but the lion is totes adorbs. Wish the giraffe didn't have Klippel-Feil syndrome. All in all, this crew of mammals is well made and will definitely satisfy anyone with Trump sized or smaller hands.
customer_reviews.author: Wolver87

customer_reviews.title: These puppets are so adorable
customer_reviews.text: The hand puppets are exactly what I was looking for in a gift for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute animal puppets
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our town public library for the young children who visit and use our puppet theatre. Very cute, good for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: amazonista

customer_reviews.title: follow up emails from seller
customer_reviews.text: everything went fine and the puppets are a big hit. My only problem is the nagging from the seller for a review!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These puppets are one of the cheapest ones I could find out there that's good enough quality. I use them for my music therapy sessions and they work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these puppets for three of my grandchildren and while I have not seen them my daughter and daughter-in-law said they are awesome and a perfect gift for the two year old and two four year old.
customer_reviews.author: Connie
